Title: Cell's Surging Resentment! Krillin, Destroy No. 18
Writer: Takao Koyama, Akira Toriyama, Sumio Uetake
Actors: Masako Nozawa, Mayumi Tanaka, Hiromi Tsuru
Plot: Vegeta is fighting Cell, can he destroy him before he combines with No.18? With the emergency shutdown in hand - can Krillin shut down No.18?
